remarks: Existential quantification over a class abstraction.  (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 17-Jun-2011.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 3-Sep-2015.)
statement:
ralab.1 $e |- ( y = x -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
rexrab $p |- ( E. x e. { y e. A | ph } ch <-> E. x e. A ( ps /\ ch ) ) $.
$d A y $.
$d ps y $.
$d x y $.
